text: Hersman is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Deborah Hersman, chair of the U.S. National Transportation Safety Board *Erik Hersman, technologist, blogger and commentator *Hugh S. Hersman (1872-1954), American politician *Martin Hersman (born 1974), Dutch skater == See also == *Hersman, Illinois, unincorporated community in Brown County, Illinois, United States *31203 Hersman, main-belt asteroid
title: Hersman
